subSections.title: Readings
Compounds
Etymology 1
subSections.text:
{{wp|lang=ja}} {{wp|Storm}}
{{ja-kanjitab|あらし|yomi=k}} {{IPAchar|/arasi/}} → {{IPAchar|/araɕi/}} From {{inh|ja|ojp|sort=あらし|-}}. Derivation theories include: * Compound of {{com|ja|sort=あらし|荒ら|tr1=ara|t1=[[desolate]], [[sparse]]|pos1=archaic|風|tr2=shi|t2=[[wind]]|pos2=obsolete}}. * From {{m|ja|荒らし|tr=arashi||[[destroyer]]}}, the {{m|ja|連用形|tr=ren'yōkei||stem or continuative form}} of verb {{m|ja|荒らす|tr=arasu||[[destroy]], [[ruin]]}}. * [[apophony|Apophonic]] form of {{m|ja|颪|tr=oroshi||[[wind]] [[blow down|blowing down]] from the [[mountain]]s}}.
